description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nTrue Divinity:
If this creature's Relic's corresponding {RACE_Avatar} is in your party, the Relic's attacks and spells ignore 25% {STAT_defense} and are 50% more potent. If the corresponding {RACE_Godspawn} is also present, this effect is doubled. This trait does not stack.
name: The Abraxas
